## Overview

In this lesson, you will learn how to perform land cover classification by using remotely sensed data and digital image analysis methods.

## Content

-   Multi-spectral Classification for Urban Land Use/Land Cover (LULC) Mapping
    -   Unsupervised classification
    -   Supervised classification
    -   [OBIA â€“ Object-Based Image Analysis(GEOBIA)](https://gisgeography.com/obia-object-based-image-analysis-geobia/)
-   Urban LULC Change Detection
-   Urban Features Extraction techniques
